subject: Re: New member
author: Laura Kimberley
full_text:
Welcome Zack,
Glad your here and look forward to your thoughts, ideas, opinions 
and experiments!!!
Laura

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Zack Widup <w9sz@...> wrote:
>
> Hi,
> 
> I just joined and I thought I'd introduce myself.
> 
> I am an electrical engineer, radio amateur and a ghost hunter 
living in 
> Urbana, IL. (Well, I like the term "paranormal investigator" 
better!)
> 
> I've gotten a lot of EVP's on a pocket DVR but I found and 
downloaded the 
> schematics for Frank's ghost box some months ago.  I'm fascinated 
by this 
> idea and I hope I can find the time to build the equipmeont some 
time 
> soon. Hopefully I will get beyond the 70-80 hour work weeks I've 
been 
> putting in for the last couple months ...
> 
> Looking forward to seeing what's happening on this group!
> 
> Zack
>
